script: Hello, this is Felicia Morgan from Ron Valencia's office calling for Robert Douglas. Mr. Douglas, Mr. Valencia would like to confirm that you received his fax yesterday with the agenda for the conference on the 24th. Additionally, he would like to schedule a conference call with you and Frederick Pepper next week to discuss the conference. Mr. Valencia is available Monday and Wednesday mornings, and Tuesday and Friday afternoons. You can confirm the fax and schedule an appointment by phoning me at 456-9876. Again, my name's Felecia Morgan. Thank you.
